title: Battleaxes
content: ck. CleaveLacerateCrippling Strike Rebound Battleaxe(In Code Only) 1d10 (1d8) Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Favoured Weapon: This weapon has a +1 bonus to damage and attack rolls.It's All In The Wrists: This weapon has the Thrown property and deals an additional 1d4 Thunder damage when thrown. CleaveLacerateCrippling Strike Thermodynamo Axe 1d10 (1d8) Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Thermodynamo Axe: Whenever you deal damage with this weapon, you gain 2 turns of Heat.
